src:
Pujian Setinggi Langit Ole Gunnar Solskjaer untuk Scott McTominay
01 Nov 2019, 20:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Manchester United, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer merasa sangat puas dengan performa yang ditunjukkan Scott McTominay. Ia percaya bahwa sang gelandang telah berkembang dengan sangat pesat musim ini.
McTominay yang merupakan didikan akademi MU mulai banyak terlibat di skuat United musim ini. Gelandang 22 tahun itu diplot menjadi pengganti Ander Herrera di lini tengah United.
Sejauh ini McTominay menunjukkan performa yang sangat impresif bagi Manchester United. Ia menjadi pemain dengan menit bermain terbanyak di skuat United setelah Harry Maguire.
Solskjaer menilai bahwa sang gelandang banyak bermain karena ia menunjukkan performa yang sangat baik di skuat United. "Dia telah bermain dengan sangat luar biasa," ujar Solskjaer yang dikutip Manchester Evening News.

Baca pujian lengkap Solskjaer untuk McTominay di bawah ini.
text:
Sky High Praise Ole Gunnar Solskjaer for Scott McTominay
Nov 1 2019, 20:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer feels very satisfied with the performance shown by Scott McTominay. He believes that the midfielder has developed very rapidly this season.
McTominay which is a MU academy education began to be heavily involved in United's squad this season. The 22-year-old midfielder was plotted to replace Ander Herrera in United's midfield.
So far McTominay has shown a very impressive performance for Manchester United. He became the player with the most minutes of play in United's squad after Harry Maguire.
Solskjaer believes that the midfielder played a lot because he showed a very good performance in the United squad. "He has played very extraordinary," Solskjaer was quoted as saying by the Manchester Evening News.

Read Solskjaer's complete praise for McTominay below.
